channel.title: Posts on Abbey Haymond
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Abbey Haymond

item.title: Even when they lose, the Patriots perform like Super Bowl Champions
item.description: The Patriots have been a powerhouse in the NFL for the past two decades. They have won six Super Bowl titles, and they looked like a team that was ready to claim another one during their 2017 season. Tom Brady had the most passing yards in a Super Bowl in 2018, so why was he not able to lead his team to a victory? I took a look at their numbers on offense during the Super Bowl.

item.title: Text Cleaning
item.description: I am going to look at the worst games from the 2019 CFB season. library(tidyverse) ## ── Attaching packages ─────────────────────────────────────── tidyverse 1.3.0 ── ## ✓ ggplot2 3.3.3 ✓ purrr 0.3.4 ## ✓ tibble 3.0.5 ✓ dplyr 1.0.3 ## ✓ tidyr 1.1.2 ✓ stringr 1.4.0 ## ✓ readr 1.4.0 ✓ forcats 0.5.0 ## ── Conflicts ────────────────────────────────────────── tidyverse_conflicts() ── ## x dplyr::filter() masks stats::filter() ## x dplyr::lag() masks stats::lag() library(ggalt) ## Registered S3 methods overwritten by 'ggalt': ## method from ## grid.
